channel.title: Problem with clicking on something and giving exp

item.title: Problem with clicking on something and giving exp
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

Ok my problem is i made a new case for geting pray exp from clicking on an alter I get the animation and the text saying you pray except i dont get any xp and the code i used is this:

[code]case 409:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“you pray”);
setAnimation(0x320);
addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[5]), 5);
actionTimer = 12;
}

break;[/code]

does any one know what i did wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2008, 08:03:58 PM[/size][hr]…nvm its owrking now

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with clicking on something and giving exp
